name: Iron Axe
description: A sturdy iron axe, perfect for chopping wood or cleaving through enemies.
looks: The iron axe has a solid wooden handle with a metal head. The head has a sharp blade on one side and a pointed spike on the other.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Strong and durable steel gauntlets that provide excellent hand and wrist protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick steel plates and have a layered design that provides both flexibility and protection. They have reinforced knuckles and adjustable straps for a secure fit.

name: Fire Staff
description: A powerful staff imbued with the elemental energy of fire. It can be used to cast devastating fire spells.
looks: The Fire Staff is a long staff made of dark wood, with intricate carvings of flames along its length. At the top is a crystal orb that glows with a fiery red light.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Increases proficiency with fire magic spells.

special_effects.fireball: Allows the user to cast a powerful fireball spell.

name: Shadow Dagger
description: A small dagger with a dark blade, perfect for stealthy assassins.
looks: The Shadow Dagger has a black blade that shimmers with an eerie, dark energy. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with a small skull-shaped pommel.

special_weapon_skills.backstab: Allows the wielder to perform a powerful backstab attack when striking an enemy from behind.

special_effects.stealth: Grants a bonus to Stealth skill when equipped.

name: Silver Shortsword
description: A well-crafted shortsword made from polished silver.
looks: The Silver Shortsword has a shining blade made of pure silver, with an intricate pattern etched along the edge. The hilt is wrapped in black leather, providing a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Greatsword
description: A massive two-handed sword with immense cutting power.
looks: The Greatsword has a long, wide blade and a double-edged design. The hilt is wrapped in leather for a secure grip. The blade is engraved with intricate patterns and designs.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword enchanted with fire, causing it to ignite in flames with every swing.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a golden hilt with intricate carvings of flames. The blade is made of silver, but when wielded, flames burst forth from the edges, giving it a fiery appearance.

special_weapon_skills.flame_strike: Allows the wielder to perform a powerful flame strike ability.

special_effects.ignite: Has a chance to ignite enemies, causing additional fire damage over time.

name: Adamantine Sword
description: A powerful sword made from adamantine, capable of cutting through even the toughest armor.
looks: The Adamantine Sword has a long, straight blade with a silver hue. The hilt is wrapped in black leather, providing a comfortable grip. It has a simple yet elegant design.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Increases damage and accuracy when wielding swords.

name: Iron Greatsword
description: A large and heavy sword made from solid iron.
looks: The Iron Greatsword has a long and wide blade, with a hilt made from sturdy leather. It has a double-edged design and a crossguard for protection.

special_weapon_skils.sword_mastery: Grants a bonus to Sword Mastery skill when used.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword that is sharp and well-balanced.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single edge and a fuller running along the length of the blade. The handle is wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Increases the effectiveness of sword-based attacks.

name: Iron Claymore
description: A heavy two-handed sword made of iron.
looks: The Iron Claymore is a massive sword with a wide blade and a long hilt. It has a leather-wrapped grip and a crossguard with a simple yet sturdy design.

name: Steel Gauntlets
looks: The steel gauntlets have a bulky, intimidating look. They are made of thick steel plates, with reinforced knuckles and finger guards.

name: Firebolt Scroll
description: A scroll containing the spell Firebolt, which launches a bolt of fire at a target.
looks: The scroll is made of delicate parchment and is inscribed with intricate runes and symbols. It radiates a faint warmth.

special_effects.spell_scroll: Can be used by anyone who knows the spell Firebolt to cast it.

name: Mithril Gauntlets
description: Gauntlets made from rare and precious mithril.
looks: The gauntlets are made of shimmering silver mithril, with decorative engravings and intricate patterns. They have articulated fingers for ease of movement and are adorned with gems.

name: Diamond Sword
description: A sharp and deadly sword made from pure diamonds.
looks: The Diamond Sword has a shiny blade made entirely of diamonds. The hilt is adorned with intricate engravings and has a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when equipped.

special_effects.critical_strike: Has a chance to deal double damage on a successful hit.
